name: victoria-alawi-fullstack-web-developer-portfolio

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && npm run build:lambda
scripts.develops: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
